name: catenis-off-chain-server
description: REST API service for sending and receiving Catenis off-chain messages

scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup-build && npm run cleanup-dist
scripts.cleanup-sandbox: npm run cleanup-build && npm run cleanup-dist-sandbox
scripts.cleanup-dev: npm run cleanup-build && npm run cleanup-dist-dev
scripts.build: npm run cleanup-build && babel src -d build && chmod u+x build/main.js
scripts.predeploy: npm run cleanup && npm run build && bin/fixnpmignore.sh && npm pack && mv *.tgz dist/
scripts.predeploy-sandbox: npm run cleanup-sandbox && npm run build && bin/fixnpmignore.sh sandbox && npm pack && bin/fixnpmignore.sh && mv *.tgz dist/sandbox
scripts.predeploy-dev: npm run cleanup-dev && npm run build && bin/fixnpmignore.sh development && npm pack && bin/fixnpmignore.sh && mv *.tgz dist/dev
